snippet.title: The Night Wanderer - Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Dive into the otherworldly realm of Midgaard! Play as Vuko Drakkainen, an elite soldier, revered by some as a God among men, who is cast from the stars to an unknown destiny. 

In this gripping action-adventure RPG, you embody the best of the best, entrusted with a mission to unravel the enigma surrounding a lost expedition of brilliant scientists en route to the mysterious, alien planet.

#TheNightWanderer #MightyKoi #gaming
